title: font made up of swashes/flourishes and dingbats, similar to Tord Boontje's artwork
content:
I don't have a photo of the font unfortunately... but I saw a font used that was made up of swashes/flourishes and dingbats that look very much like Tord Boontje's artwork (see attached). Any ideas???

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_4441.jpeg)
author: dzgnchic

comments.content: You might be interested in [Blossomy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193951/http:/www.kapitza.com/?section=fonts-blossomy) from Kaptiza.

I actually have Blossomy. The font looks more like it's made up from the dingbats and flourishes. I've made a little sample of what it's like but not the font itself.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_6733.jpg)

You've made me think of the amazing Unilever logo:  
 [http://www.identityworks.com/reviews/2004/unilever\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020193951/http:/www.identityworks.com/reviews/2004/unilever_logo.gif "http://www.identityworks.com/reviews/2004/unilever\_logo.gif") \_  
But that's just one letter. :-/

hhp
hmmm, yeah~ that's it but much more refined and modern..sucks that I didn't have a camera at the time... :/
